db:abstract.db:para: [duplicated-name] Multiple signals or properties share the same name in the same Component.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [duplicated-name] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: Multiple properties in the same QML component scope have the same name.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Components with duplicate property names will not be created at runtime: they will be null instead.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, remove the duplicate property or rename it:

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: Multiple signals in the same QML component scope have the same name.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Components with duplicate signal names will not be created at runtime: they will be null instead.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, remove the duplicate signal or rename it:
